page.title: 15BRIGG CHURCHES (CONTD.)
page.content: {Mens' Society:}2O members meet once a month on different days depending on the type of meeting. {Sunday School:}40 children meet at 9.3O am on each Sunday except the lst Sunday of the month when there is a Family Service. The church has lO{choir members}and 8{ {bellringers. }The number of{baptisms} varies as some children nowadays are not Christened as babies. There are l0 to l2{weddings}each year and 30 or 40{funerals. The Church of England and Methodist Church hold a united service in each others churches once a quarter. On Good Friday a united service is held with the Church of England and Roman Catholics at the Methodist Church. During the Week of Prayer for Christian Unity a united service is held with all three denominations
